name: iron-defense
effect: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.
